title: Endan Yobanashi
alternative_title: Yếm Đàm Dạ Thoại ; 外本ケンセイ夜馬裕 ; Grim Night Tales
status: Yếm Đàm Dạ Thoại ; 外本ケンセイ夜馬裕 ; Grim Night Tales
description:
Description :
        This horror anthology presents a collection of eerie ghost stories based on real-life accounts gathered over two decades by the renowned storyteller Yama Yuu. Adapted by Hokamoto Kensei, the manga explores the unsettling facets of human nature and madness, as a mysterious young girl narrates the tales within a secluded room. The stories promise a dark, chilling atmosphere that immerses readers in an eerie journey into the supernatural.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 5.5: Extra Story: Mr Y's Memoirs
